item.description:
Alright boys,
the night before the big group event of the month we will be having a low key traditional meetup in New Haven, on Friday night, May 29th at 8 PM. Getting there early to get food and get in a social mood. We will most likely bounce to another spot during the course of the night.

Please keep in mind that at the end of the month, non-participating memebers will be given notice that they may be deleted from the Connecticut Wingmen. Please make sure to RSVP to ensure this does not happen to you.
item.how_to_find_us: Look at my picture or call me (203) 410 6861
item.name: Friday Night - May 29th - New Haven
